tagline: Don't guess. Know what you'll pay.

target_audience.primary: Moroccan citizens ages 25-55 with health insurance (CNOPS/CNSS)
pain_points: Uncertainty about medication prices at pharmacy
Not knowing reimbursement amounts before purchase
Feeling financially unprepared when visiting pharmacy

brand_identity.name: TAAWIDATY (تعويضاتي)
brand_identity.key_message: Know your medication price and reimbursement before you walk into the pharmacy.

character_description.name: Hassan

appearance.clothing: Modern Moroccan djellaba (light beige/cream color) worn casually over jeans
appearance.accessories: Wireless earbuds, smartphone (iPhone or Samsung in hand)
appearance.style: Contemporary Moroccan professional - blend of tradition and modernity

character_description.personality: Relatable everyman, health-conscious, tech-savvy, financially responsible

scenes.title: THE PROBLEM - Financial Anxiety
scenes.location: Exterior - Moroccan street near pharmacy (late afternoon golden hour)

shots.description: Hassan walks toward camera on a typical Moroccan street (colorful building facades, terracotta walls visible). He slows down as he approaches a pharmacy (green cross sign visible in background, slightly out of focus). Expression: concerned, brow slightly furrowed.
shots.lighting: Golden hour warm sunlight from side, creating soft shadows
shots.character_action: Walking pace slows, hand moves unconsciously toward pocket
visual_details: Pharmacy sign glows softly in background
Moroccan architectural details (zellige tiles, arched doorways)

shots.description: Hassan stops 3 meters from pharmacy entrance. His hand reaches into his djellaba pocket and pulls out his wallet. Camera captures his back and the pharmacy entrance ahead.
shots.character_action: Pauses, pulls out wallet, looks down at it
visual_details: Pharmacy entrance in focus in background
Other pedestrians passing by (slight motion blur)
Wallet is brown leather, slightly worn (relatable)

shots.description: Hassan opens wallet revealing modest cash (a few Moroccan dirham bills - 20, 50 DH visible). Expression implied through hands: slight hesitation, fingers hover over bills.
visual_details: Moroccan dirham bills in warm lighting
Shallow depth of field (wallet in focus, background blurred)
shots.emotional_cue: Moment of financial worry - will I have enough?

audio.ambient_sound: Soft Moroccan street ambience (distant voices, light traffic)
audio.music: Minimal tension - low sustained string note

shots.description: Hassan closes wallet, pauses thoughtfully. His expression shifts from worry to realization. He reaches for his smartphone instead. A soft 'aha moment' expression crosses his face.
shots.character_action: Closes wallet, pockets it, pulls out smartphone with purposeful movement
shots.lighting: Golden hour continues, soft rim light on phone screen
shots.emotional_beat: Shift from anxiety to proactive problem-solving

shots.camera_movement: Slow dolly in toward phone screen
shots.framing: Phone screen becomes prominent in frame
shots.description: Hassan unlocks phone and navigates to browser/app. Camera moves to favor phone screen which occupies lower third of frame. We see his hands typing 'taawidaty.ma' into the browser address bar, then the website loads.
shots.character_action: Unlocks phone, types URL, taps to open site

ui_specifications.phone_model: Modern smartphone (iPhone 14 Pro or Samsung S23 aesthetic)

website_recreation.accuracy: Pixel-perfect match to actual taawidaty.ma mobile UI
elements_visible: Hero text in Arabic: 'تمن؟ التعويض؟ قلب و عرف دابا.'
Search bar with placeholder: 'ابحث عن دواء'
website_recreation.animation: Page loads smoothly, hero text animates in with gradient shimmer effect

visual_details: Hassan's face partially visible in background (soft focus) showing concentration
Phone held at comfortable viewing angle (slightly tilted toward Hassan)
Fingers typing visible, natural hand position

audio.music: Uplifting progression - soft marimba/synth melody begins

scenes.title: THE INTERACTION - Using the Tool
scenes.location: Same exterior, Hassan standing aside from pharmacy entrance

shots.camera_angle: Close-up, phone screen straight-on (simulated screen recording overlay)
shots.description: Full-screen UI capture: Hassan selects 'CNOPS' insurance option (button highlights with smooth animation). Then taps the search bar.
ui_interaction_sequence: User taps 'CNOPS' button → button fills with gradient color, checkmark appears

insurance_selector.active_state: CNOPS button filled with brand gradient

shots.character_action: Hassan's thumb taps screen (visible briefly at edge of frame)

shots.description: Hassan types medication name 'Doliprane 1000mg' into search bar. Auto-suggest dropdown appears showing matching medications.
ui_interaction_sequence: Dropdown list animates in from top showing 3 medication matches

search_results.layout: Clean white cards with subtle shadow

shots.camera_angle: Medium close-up, angled over Hassan's shoulder
shots.description: Hassan taps the first medication result. His expression: focused, engaged. Screen transitions to results page.
shots.character_action: Taps medication, eyes follow content on screen, slight nod

shots.camera_angle: Close-up, phone screen with subtle 3D tilt
shots.description: Results page displayed in full detail. Clean card layout showing reimbursement breakdown. Key numbers prominently displayed with animated count-up effect.

price_breakdown.label: أنت تدفع (You Pay)
price_breakdown.style: Extra large, bold, primary brand color

results_card_layout.visual_hierarchy: Clear separation between sections with subtle dividers
results_card_layout.celebration_effect: Subtle confetti animation (2-3 particles) when results appear

shots.emotional_beat: Relief and clarity - numbers are clear and reassuring

sound_effects: Subtle counting sound during number animation
audio.music: Uplifting melody continues, adds light percussion

scenes.title: THE RESOLUTION - Confident Action
scenes.location: Exterior to interior transition - approaching pharmacy entrance

shots.camera_movement: Slow tilt up as Hassan rises/stands tall
shots.description: Hassan looks up from his phone with a confident smile. He pockets the phone in his djellaba with a satisfied, purposeful movement. His posture straightens, shoulders back.
shots.character_action: Looks up, smiles (genuine, relieved), pockets phone, stands tall
shots.lighting: Golden hour light catches his face, creating warm glow
shots.emotional_beat: Transformation complete - from worried to empowered
visual_details: Pharmacy entrance visible in background (slightly out of focus)

shots.description: Hassan walks confidently toward pharmacy entrance, head held high. Smooth, purposeful stride. He enters through the door (automatic door opens). Camera follows his movement fluidly.
shots.character_action: Walks with confidence, enters pharmacy, slight smile remains
shots.lighting: Exterior warm golden hour transitioning to interior pharmacy lighting (cooler, brighter whites)
visual_details: Pharmacy interior partially visible as door opens (clean, modern)
Hassan's djellaba flows naturally with movement
Green pharmacy cross sign visible above entrance
shots.emotional_payoff: Problem solved. Confidence restored. Ready to proceed.

audio.ambient_sound: Street to interior transition (exterior fades, interior pharmacy ambience fades in)
sound_effects: Subtle pharmacy interior ambience (soft AC hum, distant voices)
audio.music: Music reaches pleasant resolution (major chord progression)

scenes.title: THE BRAND REVEAL - Call to Action

shots.description: Clean branded end card. White/gradient background. TAAWIDATY logo animates in with smooth scale + fade. Arabic and French text below. Website URL prominently displayed.

animation_sequence.effect: Smooth gradient (#0077be to #40ffaa) fills screen from center
TAAWIDATY logo scales from 0.8 to 1.0, fades from 0% to 100% opacity, subtle bounce easing
Text fades in: 'تمن؟ التعويض؟ قلب و عرف دابا.' (slight stagger per word)
Text fades in below: 'Prix ? Remboursement ? La réponse instantanée.'
Large bold 'taawidaty.ma' fades in at bottom, slight glow effect
Static hold with subtle gradient animation (colors shift smoothly)

logo.style: Official TAAWIDATY brand logo with gradient

tagline_arabic.text: تمن؟ التعويض؟ قلب و عرف دابا.

audio.music: Musical signature - short branded audio logo (uplifting 2-note melody + soft chime)

voiceover.language: Bilingual (Arabic primary, French secondary) OR instrumental only
voiceover.note: Optional - music alone may be sufficient for brand recall

actor_requirements: Moroccan or North African male actor, 35-45 years old
Comfortable wearing traditional Moroccan clothing in modern context
Capable of subtle emotional range (worry → relief → confidence)

requirements: Real pharmacy with visible green cross sign
Traditional Moroccan architectural elements (zellige, arches, terracotta)
Good natural light for golden hour shoot (late afternoon)
Low pedestrian traffic for clean shots (or use extras)
location_scouting.backup_option: Controlled set with authentic Moroccan street facade

ui_design_recreation.critical_requirement: Mobile UI must be PIXEL-PERFECT match to actual taawidaty.ma website
implementation_options: Option A: Film actual website on real device (preferred for authenticity)
Option B: Screen recording overlay composited in post-production
Option C: High-fidelity UI animation created in After Effects matching exact design
key_elements_to_match: Hero text with gradient animation effect
Results card layout with price breakdown

cinematography.camera: High-end cinema camera or professional mirrorless (Sony FX3, Canon R5C, or similar)
cinematography.lenses: Prime lenses for shallow depth of field (35mm, 50mm, 85mm)
cinematography.stabilization: Gimbal for tracking shots (DJI RS3 or similar), tripod for locked shots
cinematography.lighting: Natural golden hour primary, subtle fill reflectors, practical pharmacy lighting

palette: Brand gradient colors (#0077be, #40ffaa, #4079ff) subtly integrated in UI shots
color_grading.reference: Contemporary Moroccan cinema aesthetic (modern, not overly filtered)

post_production.transitions: Smooth, motivated cuts; subtle motion graphics for UI
vfx_requirements: Subtle confetti/celebration animation on results screen
Optional: light grade enhancement for golden hour
sound_design: Moroccan-inspired musical signature (optional oud or percussion elements)
Professional mix optimized for mobile playback

distribution_strategy.captions: Burned-in bilingual subtitles (Arabic + French) recommended for sound-off viewing

marketing_strategy.core_message: Stop worrying about medication costs. TAAWIDATY gives you instant clarity before you pay.
marketing_strategy.emotional_hook: Transformation from financial anxiety to confident action through digital empowerment
unique_value_proposition: Know exactly what you'll pay before entering the pharmacy
marketing_strategy.call_to_action: Visit taawidaty.ma before your next pharmacy visit

cultural_authenticity: Genuine Moroccan location (not generic Middle Eastern)
Relatable everyman character (not affluent or struggling - middle class)
localization_notes.music_considerations: Modern production with subtle Moroccan instrumentation (avoid cliché orientalist tropes)

brand_consistency.logo_usage: Official TAAWIDATY logo with gradient as per brand guidelines
brand_consistency.typography: Match website fonts (Arabic: bold modern sans-serif; French: clean sans-serif)

concept_2_family.title: Mother purchasing child's medication
concept_2_family.scenario: Child has fever, needs medication urgently, mother checks TAAWIDATY first

concept_3_elderly.title: Senior citizen managing chronic medication
concept_3_elderly.scenario: Monthly prescription refill, checks multiple medications, sees total savings

concept_4_comparison.title: Split screen: with/without TAAWIDATY
concept_4_comparison.structure: Left side: confusion/worry | Right side: clarity/confidence
